medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented with symptoms of lymphadenopathy and night sweats. Initially, his CD4 cell count was low at 45 cells/mL but showed improvement to 121 cells/mL after treatment before he was lost to follow-up. Five months later, he returned with similar symptoms and a further decreased CD4 cell count of 8 cells/mL, indicating worsening of his condition.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, narcotic dependence, homelessness, long-standing history of HIV infection and AIDS.
